Naiara Perin Darim

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/8734520572994171
  • Última atualização do currículo em 12/04/2018

I have a masters degree in psychology and health, and a bachelor's in psychology, both taken in Brazil and validated by WES. I'm persuing my registration at the College of Psychologists of Ontario as psychological associate with supervised practice. My first experiences were internships in human resources at Microlins and Americanflex, I worked for about a year in each of them. After my bachelor's I worked at an NGO for substance users called GADA (support group for AIDS patients) doing what we called 'damage reduction? through which I approached drug users that were living on the streets and offered them health support, shelter, among other things. During this period I took a specialization course at a medical university (FAMERP) working at a Hospital. After that I worked at the College of psychologists (CRPSP) as an ethics fiscal, there I gave orientation for the new psychologists and verified documentation and work ethics through complaints. During this period I took a specialization course at a law school (LFG) about civilian rights. Later I opened a private clinic with colleagues and started my master?s degree at the same medical university (FAMERP). I worked as an autonomous clinical psychologist for about four years, during one of them I also taught English at Wise Up. As my experience shows I?m very passionate about my profession, very dedicated and really like new experiences. (Texto informado pelo autor)
